titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Correspondence and subject files of the Virginia Director of the Secretary of Administration and Finance, 1976-1985.
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 32423, 32621, 32883, 32968, 33039

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence and subject files of the Secretary of Administration and Finance,
did.origination: Virginia. Secretary of Administration and Finance.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Office of the Secretary of Administration and the Office of the Secretary of Finance were created as two separate secretariats in 1972, but were combined into one secretariat in 1976. The two secretariats were again split into two separate entities in 1984.
Secretaries of Administration and Finance include: Maurice B. Rowe, 1976-1978; Charles Walker, 1978-1981; Stuart Connock, 1981-1982; and Wayne F. Anderson, 1982-1984.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This series includes the incoming and outgoing correspondence and memoranda of the Secretary of Administration and Finance, as well as subject files. These records document the planning, development and establishment of policies and procedures of the secretariat and its assigned agencies.
Files may include correspondence, articles, brochures, legislation, manuals, meeting records, notes, programs, publications, regulations, reports, and studies.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence and Subject Files of the Virginia Secretary of Administration and Finance. [cite specific date and Accession number used], State records collection, The Library of Virginia, Archives Branch, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 32423 was transferred by the Virginia Secretary of Administration, June 24, 1985.
Accession 32621 was transferred by the Virginia Secretary of Finance, January 16, 1986.
Accession 32883 was transferred by the Virginia Secretary of Finance, December 30, 1986.
Accession 32968 was transferred by the Virginia Secretary of Finance, April 21, 1987.
Accession 33039 was transferred by the Virginia Secretary of Finance, XX

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection has been processed using minimal processing standards: the original arrangement has been maintained, the container list is brief and simple, and the records have not been refoldered and fasteners have not been removed.
